title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The tangent line equation is not required to be in slope-intercept form.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct tangent line equation.
The student response accurately includes a correct tangent line equation.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Zero out of 6 points earned if no separation of variables.

At most 4 out of 6 points earned [1-1-1-1-0-0] if no constant of integration.

The sixth point requires an expression for y .
